metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12207 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - high
metadata.Description:
Improper invalidation for page table updates by a virtual guest operatingsystem for multiple Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user topotentially enable denial of service of the host system via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12207` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-generic - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-lowlatency - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-snapdragon - 5.4.0-9.12
No subscription required
